item.description:
Indoor yoga just can't compare to practicing in the great outdoors. Come celebrate the beginning of Fall with a hike in the brisk September morning air as the leaves are turning a beautiful shade of crimson.

This yoga hike, at Wadsworth Falls State Park, will end with a light yoga stretching/meditation session followed by a healthy snack at the park's Big Falls. Waterfalls release negative ions into the air. This makes the atmosphere very healthy for practicing yoga and breathing meditation. Read more ...

Please pack a light lunch and bring a blanket or a mat to practice on. Beginners are welcome!

Please visit the CT DEP's website for maps/directions to the park.

I will email my cell phone number to all Yes rsvp's the day before the hike.
item.name: Hiking & Yoga - Wadsworth Falls
